Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-3-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST BY TOKEN LIST

Test.Name: Correct response with one token

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-3-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST BY TOKEN LIST
Test.Name: Correct response with more than one token

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-3-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST BY TOKEN LIST
Test.Name: Incorrect response - two equal tokens in the 1st GetAreaInfoListByTokenList request
Test.Description: GetAreaInfoListByTokenList message contains two AreaInfo items with equal tokens.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-3-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST BY TOKEN LIST
STEP 1 - Get PACS service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePACS11/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get AreaInfo list by Token list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that tokens are unique Token 'tokenAccessPoint1' is not unique STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-3-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST BY TOKEN LIST
Test.Name: Incorrect response - more then one entry in the 2nd GetAreaInfoListByTokenList request
Test.Description: GetAreaInfoListByTokenListResponse message contains two AreaInfo items with equal tokens.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-3-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST BY TOKEN LIST
STEP 1 - Get PACS service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePACS11/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get AreaInfo list by Token list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that tokens are unique STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get AreaInfo list by Token list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that tokens are unique Token 'tokenAccessPoint1' is not unique STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
